info.name: simple-skipped-folder
info.description:
this is test description | CODE | STATUS | RESULT | | ---- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | | 200 | success | | | 404 | no_data_found | No saved report found for the logged-in user | | 400 | failure | 1. "combination is not valid" WHEN any one parameter is invalid in request URL

2. "not in sync" WHEN values of parameters do not match between request URL and request payload | # Description Hi Everyone , here you can find demo collections of some tricky but interesting postman usecases like 1. Data driven using envirnment variable (**without using datafile**) 2. Data driven using **Google sheets** 3. **Reseting variables** after collection run completes 4. Run requests using **Tags** 5. Sending certain request after each request using **postman.setNextRequest** 6. Sending certain request before and after each request using **pm.sendRequest** 7. Sending a request n times ![party](https://media1.giphy.com/media/cKbLJzS0cOTklEmzto/giphy.gif)
